msContents.summary: Tax register, recording day by day the collection of money taxes.

msItemStruct.note: Pub. status: Recto; Verso is blank
+ P.Cair. Inv. 57187; P.Iand. VII, 141; P.Mich. Inv. 2830; 4171; 4910

condition.ab: Reguularly cut at the left hand side. kollesis att the middle of the column. The papyrus is broken at the left hand side of the column as a result of a fold. Couple dots of ink on Verso. kollesis at the middle of the column. Except that the number of the column is lost the text is complete. (MA)

handDesc.p: Written in a quick but clear cursive. The scribe separated a new entry from the preceding one with an oblique stroke going downwards to the left margin, and a couple of times by underlining the name of the tax payer.
